translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Conditions

original: 17.23. Upādinnattika, Kusalattika🔽Anupādinnupādāniyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: upādinna ttika kusala ttika  anupādinnupādāniyam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na aupādinnupādāniyaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: The Chapter on the Conditions in Brief🔽With respect to the profitable, etc., dissociated from acquisitions, etc.🔽With respect to the profitable dissociated from acquisitions, there are three triplets and three couplets.🔽With respect to the unprofitable dissociated from acquisitions, there are three triplets and three couplets.

original: Anupādinnaanupādāniyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanupādinnaanupādāniyo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.🔽Anupādinnupādāniyaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anupādinna anupādāniyam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na anupādinna anupādāniyaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha  anupādinnupādāniyam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na aupādinnupādāniyaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With respect to the indeterminate dissociated from acquisitions, there are five triplets and five couplets.🔽With respect to the profitable associated with greed, there are three triplets and three couplets.🔽With respect to the unprofitable associated with greed, there are three triplets and three couplets.

original: Upādinnupādāniyaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naupādinnupādāniyo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: upādinnupādāniyam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na upādinnupādāniyaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca pe avigate pañca
translated: With respect to the indeterminate associated with greed, there are five triplets and five couplets.
